title: inconvenient rune pages!!
body:
really riot your telling me that i have to buy rune pages that i can change in champ select, like what its such a dumb system. riot games: o here we have a great system will make then want to buy rune pages because its the most inconvenient thing in league of legends to always change the rune page to then only someone dodge and then someone ban that champ you where going to play so you have to remake that page all over again.
plz explain this to me if you can just change it in lobby then why do i have to buy the rune pages.
